extension_desc.message: Adds a toggleable sidebar with all your bookmarks at the edge of your browser window.

sidebar_search_no_results.message: No bookmarks matching your search value

overlay_confirm_open_children.message: Do you really want to open all {1} subordinate bookmarks?

overlay_hide_bookmark_confirm.message: Do you really want to hide this bookmark from the sidebar?

overlay_hide_dir_confirm.message: Do you really want to hide this directory from the sidebar? All subordinate bookmarks will be hidden too.

overlay_delete_bookmark_confirm.message: Do you really want to delete this bookmark?

overlay_delete_dir_confirm.message: Do you really want to delete this directory? All subordinate bookmarks will be removed too.

overlay_separator_title_desc.message: You can optionally enter a title. It will be displayed on top of the separator line and can help you organising your bookmark list.

overlay_check_bookmarks_no_results_chang.message: There are no changed bookmark URLs

overlay_check_bookmarks_no_results_broke.message: There are no broken bookmark URLs

overlay_check_bookmarks_no_results_dupli.message: There are no duplicate bookmark URLs

overlay_check_bookmarks_no_results_empty.message: There are no directories without bookmarks

newtab_speech_search_error.message: To enable the speech search, you have to allow microphone access.

newtab_fallback_headline_webstore.message: The sidebar cannot be used on the {browserName} Webstore

newtab_fallback_headline_extension_page.message: The sidebar cannot be used on extension pages

newtab_fallback_headline_new_tab.message: The sidebar cannot be used on the default new tab page

newtab_fallback_headline_system.message: The sidebar cannot be used on {browserName} system pages

newtab_fallback_headline_url_filter.message: One of your URL rules disallowed the sidebar to open

newtab_fallback_desc.message: We have opened a new tab with the sidebar for you instead.

newtab_fallback_set_as_new_tab.message: Always show this page when opening a new tab

status_check_bookmarks_unavailable_desc.message: The service which checks the URLs is not available at the moment. Please try again later.

status_feedback_unavailable_desc.message: The feedback service is currently unavailable. If you want to give feedback, please send me an email.

status_translation_unavailable_desc.message: The translation service is not available at the moment. Please try again later.

status_background_disconnected_reload_de.message: Due to an update of the extension this page needs to be reloaded.

keyboard_shortcuts_tab_desc.message: Hovers the next or previous entry in the sidebar

keyboard_shortcuts_enter_desc.message: Performs a click on the currently hovered entry

keyboard_shortcuts_shift_enter_desc.message: Opens the contextmenu for the currently hovered entry

keyboard_shortcuts_ctrl_c_desc.message: Copies the URL of the currently hovered entry

keyboard_shortcuts_esc_desc.message: Closes the sidebar, the opened overlay or contextmenu

contribute_intro.message: To improve the extension I would like to know better about how users are using the sidebar and what configuration they use.

contribute_outro.message: If you have questions or concerns about the sharing of information, please send me a feedback message.

contribute_share_config_desc.message: You share your configuration anonymously, which helps me to identify popular settings and figure out, what to improve or change in future releases.

contribute_share_activity_desc1.message: You can share your activity within the sidebar anonymously, which helps me to know how users are using the sidebar in general. Information about your bookmarks or your visited websites [b]will not[/b] be measured.

contribute_share_activity_desc2.message: This information is very useful to identify problems in usability or features which are for example not used very often.

contribute_share_activity_examples_intro.message: Data which are shared are for example:

contribute_share_activity_example_1.message: How many bookmarks do users have in average?

contribute_share_activity_example_2.message: Which platform are the users on (Windows, Mac, Linux, ...)?

contribute_share_activity_example_4.message: Do users change the sorting of the bookmarks?

contribute_share_activity_example_5.message: How often are users rearranging or editing entries?

onboarding_headline.message: Thank you for installing this extension.

onboarding_sidebar_position_desc.message: Where do you want to have your sidebar?

onboarding_sidebar_open_action_desc.message: How do you want to open your sidebar?

onboarding_handson_desc.message: Now you can try it out yourself.

onboarding_handson_mouse_desc_1.message: Move your cursor to the {1} edge of your window.

onboarding_handson_mouse_desc_2.message: Then {1} click with your mouse to open the sidebar.

onboarding_handson_icon_desc.message: Click on the extension icon to open the sidebar.

onboarding_finish_notice.message: If you are frequently clicking things on the {1} side of the browser window, you may want to change where the sidebar can be opened vertically to avoid opening it accidentally.

settings_restore_confirm.message: Do you really want to restore the default configuration?

settings_not_synced.message: Will not be synchronized across your devices.

settings_premium_invalid_key.message: Could not activate Premium. Please enter a valid license key

settings_expert_settings_desc.message: With the expert settings, you can change every configuration flag of the extension, even those you cannot change using the regular checkboxes or sliders of the settings page.

settings_expert_settings_notice.message: Please do only change the values here, if you know what you are doing. Faulty configurations can cause unexpected behaviour of the extension. If something breaks, you can revert to the default configuration.

settings_expert_save_error.message: Could not save settings. Please correct your input.

settings_open_action_desc.message: Open the sidebar by left or right clicking or mouseover on the edge of the browser window. Alternatively you can change it to open only if the icon in the {browserName} menu is clicked.

settings_toggle_area_desc.message: Per default, the whole edge of your browser window can be hovered to open the sidebar. You can change this and configure where to open the sidebar exactly.

settings_toggle_area_height_desc.message: You can reduce the height of the area, so the sidebar will only open when you move your cursor into that location of the edge of your browser window.

settings_link_action_desc.message: Left click a bookmark will open them either in the current tab or in a new tab.

settings_open_delay_desc.message: Prevents, that the sidebar will open immediately when hovering or clicking the activation area.

settings_prevent_pagescroll_desc.message: Prevents scrolling of the current website while the sidebar is open.

settings_dir_accordion_desc.message: Closes all directories except the currently active one.

settings_remember_state_all.message: Scroll position, opened directories and last opened bookmark

settings_remember_desc.message: Select what to remember across page changes. If you choose to remember the last opened bookmark, it will be marked when opening the sidebar again.

settings_dnd_creation_dialog_desc.message: Show the creation dialog before adding a new bookmark when drag&drop into the sidebar.

settings_new_entry_position_desc.message: The preselected position when adding new entries to the sidebar.

settings_open_children_warn_limit_desc.message: Amount of bookmarks at which a warning appears, when trying to open all children of a directory at once.

settings_dir_open_duration_desc.message: Duration of the open and close animation of directories

settings_new_tab_desc.message: Open bookmarks in new tab in the foreground or the background

settings_new_tab_position_desc.message: Open new tabs after the last or the current tab

settings_close_timeout_desc.message: Timeout in seconds after the sidebar will be closed. It will count as soon the mouse leaves the sidebar and stops when hovering it again.

settings_scroll_bar_hide_desc.message: Timeout in seconds after the scrollbar will be hidden. Scrolling will show the scrollbar again.

settings_dnd_open_dir_delay_desc.message: Delay before opening a hovered directory when dragging an element over it.

settings_reopen_sidebar_desc.message: Automatically open the sidebar again, after opening a bookmark from within the sidebar.

settings_prevent_windowed_desc.message: Disables the possibility to open the sidebar by clicking or hovering the edge of the browser content when the browser is in window mode.

settings_tooltip_delay_desc.message: Delay before the tooltips for the bookmarks will be displayed when hovering with the mouse.

settings_tooltip_desc.message: Select what information the tooltip should contain.

settings_sidebar_position_desc.message: Allows you to set whether the sidebar should open on the left or the right edge of the browser window.

settings_animations_desc.message: Allows you to disable the entire animations of the sidebar. This can be useful if the animations are not running smooth on your system.

settings_filter_intro.message: If you don't want the sidebar to be loaded on every page, you can configure where to load the extension (whitelist) or where not to (blacklist).

settings_filter_explanation_1.message: Only add one URL pattern per line

settings_filter_explanation_2.message: Use * to match any character (e.g. example.com/* matches all pages under example.com)

settings_filter_explanation_3.message: If you don't include any * in a rule, only the exact URL will match (e.g. "example.com" won't match for the URL "example.com/about.html")

settings_filter_explanation_4.message: You don't need to add the protocol (e.g. http://) in the rules

settings_filter_visibility_blacklist.message: On every page except specific pages

settings_import_export_notice.message: The extension settings are synchronized automatically between your devices, if you are logged in to {browserName} with your Google account. If you don't want to login or want to share your settings with other people, you can use this import/export option.

settings_import_export_desc.message: You can export your extension settings and save them locally on your computer. You can import the previously exported file on any computer, where the extension is installed.

settings_import_failed.message: Failed to import the configuration. Please choose a valid file.

settings_presets_desc.message: You can select predefined sizes for the sidebar. This will change the sliders on this page to adjust the sidebar width, line heights, icon sizes and many more options.

settings_color_scheme_desc.message: The color of the sidebar header, checkboxes, etc.

settings_font_family_desc.message: The typeface of the sidebar and the overlays

settings_icon_color_desc_1.message: The icon color will be set automatically to match color scheme of your system (light or dark). You can also define your own custom color for the icon.

settings_icon_color_desc_2.message: Please note that the automatic color is not working, when using a custom {browserName} theme.

settings_custom_css_desc.message: You can define your own stylesheet to override the default styling. Please only use this option, if you are familiar with CSS and know what you are doing.

settings_newtab_desc.message: Unfortunately Google removed the possibility of loading extensions on the default new tab page. Because of this I added some options allowing you to access your bookmarks when opening a new tab in another way.

settings_newtab_override_desc.message: Should the extension override your current new tab page with either a custom made or a website which should be loaded when opening a new tab?

settings_newtab_sidebar_auto_open_desc.message: Configure whether the sidebar should be opened automatically when opening a new tab.

settings_newtab_website_desc.message: Instead of opening the new tab replacement, you can set a website which is loaded instead.

settings_language_desc.message: The language of the user interface

settings_translation_desc.message: You can help translating the extension in your language or improve the existing one.

settings_translation_info.message: You can edit existing translations or add missing ones. If you submit your changes, I will review your input and approve it.

settings_translation_notice1.message: As soon as all categories, which are marked as required are translated, the translation will be released.

settings_translation_notice2.message: Incomplete categories will not be released, to prevent half translated texts.

settings_translation_help.message: For each entry you can see the English translation, which needs to be translated in your language. To help you identifing where the text is used and what it is for, each entry has a name (e.g. {1}), which should not be translated. Please don't forget to submit your translation by pressing the button in the top right corner!

settings_translation_reminder_desc.message: I want to be notified when new language variables are being added to the extension

settings_translation_submit_message.message: Your translation has been submitted successfully

settings_translation_status_incomplete.message: Translation is available, but some categories are incomplete

settings_translation_status_draft.message: Translation is incomplete or needs a review and is not available for users

settings_translation_thanks_desc.message: I really appreciate your support by translating the extensions texts. I would like to thank you by sending you a [b]free license key[/b], which you can use to activate Premium. If you leave your email address, I will get back to you.

settings_feedback_desc.message: Have any suggestions for improvements, questions, notice missing configuration options, or found a bug? To help improve experiences with this extension I would be very grateful for any and all feedback given or you might have.

settings_feedback_notice.message: Please compose your feedback in English, otherwise It will be difficult to understand and answer your message.

settings_feedback_screenshot_error_files.message: The file size of {1} is too big (> 1 MB)

settings_feedback_screenshot_error_amoun.message: You can only upload a maximum of {1} screenshots

settings_feedback_send_failed.message: Your message could not be sent. Please try again.

settings_feedback_faq_headline.message: This may be of interest to you

settings_about_me_desc.message: Hello world... My name is [b]Philipp König[/b] and I'm a Software Developer from Aalen, Germany. I didn't like the default bookmark management of {browserName}, so I started making this extension back in 2016 and uploaded it to the {browserName} Webstore, so other people can try it out. At that time I couldn't imagine that so many people will use my extension, send me feedback, ideas or report issues. That's why the extension got many new features, improvements and translations in other languages over the time.

settings_permissions_desc.message: In order to make a togglable sidebar possible in {browserName}, the following permissions are required and requested by the extension:

settings_permissions_contentscript_desc_.message: Unfortunately {browserName} has no mechanism to display content in the browser window without interacting with the currently visiting page.
Since the sidebar is being displayed on top of the current website, this permission is required. Besides this technical reason, the permission is not used for other purposes.
If you have concerns regarding what I'm doing with the permission, you can view the source code of the extension on Github. It's Open Source and visible for everyone.

settings_permissions_bookmarks_desc.message: The extension is displaying your bookmarks in the sidebar and therefore needs this permission to get access. The permission also allows the extension to add, edit and remove bookmarks.

settings_saved_share_userdata.message: Your preference has been saved successfully

premium_popup_text.message: Have you checked out Premium yet?

premium_restricted_text.message: This feature is only available with Premium

premium_desc_1.message: With Premium you will get access to additional features and help me maintaining the extension.

premium_desc_2.message: You can check out the features included in Premium below. All key features of the extensions are free to use and won't require Premium at all. You can pay what the extension and my work is worth to you, to get access to these features.

premium_feature_early_access_headline.message: Be the first one trying out new experimental features

premium_feature_early_access_desc.message: With Premium you get access to unreleased features, which are currently under development or undergoing testing.

premium_feature_sidebar_width_headline.message: Change the width of your sidebar at any time

premium_feature_custom_background_desc.message: If you are using the New Tab page of this extension, you can set your own background image to make it look even nicer.

premium_feature_custom_css_headline.message: Customize everything with your own Stylesheet

premium_feature_custom_css_desc.message: If you are familiar with CSS, you can change the complete appearance of the sidebar by adding your own style definitions. This allows you to customize absolutely everything.

premium_feature_linkchecker_headline.message: Check your bookmarks for broken links or duplicates

premium_feature_linkchecker_desc.message: You can right-click any directory in your sidebar and perform a check. The result page will show all updated URLs, bookmarks which are no longer working and bookmarks with the same URL.

premium_pay_wechat_desc.message: Scan this QR code on WeChat to proceed.

premium_pay_contact.message: If you are encountering any issues with your payment or have any questions, please contact me at {1}.

premium_pay_price_info.message: This is a one-time charge and includes all future premium features as well.

premium_pay_eula_desc.message: I read and accept the [a]End-User License Agreement[/a]

premium_pay_success_info.message: {1} has been activated automatically for this device. You don't have to do any further steps.

premium_pay_license_key_desc.message: If you want to activate {1} on another device or after reinstalling the extension, you can enter the following key in the settings of the extension:

premium_pay_info_email_desc.message: Please enter your mail address to receive the license key.
